short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing BuhBye Elon, a browser extension and website for those saying farewell to Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BuhBye Elon is a browser extension and website for those saying farewell to Twitter. The extension makes it easy to deactivate & delete your Twitter account, while ensuring that you don't (accidentally) reactivate it again. The website buhbye-elon.com allows you to let people where you move to. So why wait? Say goodbye to Twitter for good with BuhBye Elon.
